dcterms:creator: W. H. Press
S. A. Teukolsky
W. T. Vetterling
B. P. Flannery
dcterms:description: The diﬀusion database contains solutions to a simple 1D diﬀusion problem that determines the spatially-integrated concentration in a system as a function of time. The time evolution of the concentration is found by solving a discretized diﬀusion equation on a grid of arbitrary resolution.
dcterms:title: 1D Diﬀusion

dcterms:creator: G. C. Pomraning
dcterms:description: The radiation hydrodynamics dataset tests the ability of the models to predict high-dimensional time histories generated by a more expensive multi-physics code with non-analytic solutions.
dcterms:title: 1D Radiation Hydrodynamics

dcterms:creator: J. Gaffney
P. Springer
G. Collins
dcterms:description: The dataset is generated with a semi-analytic inertial conﬁnement fusion (ICF) implosion code. The implosion model describes the stagnation of an ICF implosion using an analytic spatial transport model, a 3-D shape model, and a numerical energy balance model.
dcterms:title: 3D Inertial Confinement Fusion Implosion Simulations

dcterms:creator: J. Gaffney
D. Casey
D. Callahan
E. Hartouni
T. Ma
B. Spears
dcterms:description: This dataset includes simulations of NIF high foot implosions, focusing on data-driven models of performance and repeatability.
dcterms:title: 3D Inertial Confinement Fusion Implosion Simulations (another reference)
